Aaron Malocha

CEO of Siege Perilous

Aaron is an IS student and future professional based in Ypsilanti, MI. He is a senior at Eastern Michigan University majoring in Information Systems and minoring in Computer Science. His ambition is to dream in code. He lives in Ypsilanti with his wife and two children.
